name: Sounds For Your Life - Hundreds of High Quality Sound Effects and Jingles!
name_original: Sounds For Your Life - Hundreds of High Quality Sound Effects and Jingles!
description:
With hundreds of high quality sound effects and jingles you can play the perfect noise or song at the exact right time!

Have you ever wanted to walk into a room and play the perfect sound effect for everyone to hear? Have you ever wanted to play laughing and clapping noises for yourself or play crickets when someone else tells a joke?

Sounds For Your Life helps you do just that! And more!

Sounds For Your Life comes with:
- Ambience Sound Effects
- Animal Noises Sound Effects
- Booming Sound Effects
- Mechanical and Machine Sound Effects
- Foley Sound Effects
- People Talking, Laughing, Clapping, etc. Sound Effects
- 50+ Jingles and Songs for any occasion
- (Pro Version Only) Suspense Sound Effects
- (Pro Version Only) Electric and Sci-Fi Sound Effects

Play multiple sound effects at once to make the perfect noises for you and your friends to hear!

Sounds For Your Life Features:
- Hundreds of ultra high quality sound effects, jingles, songs, and more
- iPhone, iPad, iPod touch compatible
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 5.1+
